articles.description: Sony has revealed the games joining its PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium catalogue in March, with Capcom's Resident E…
articles.content: Sony has revealed the games joining its PlayStation Plus Extra and Premium catalogue in March, with Capcom's Resident Evil 3 remake and Firaxis' stellar superhero strategy game Marvel's Midnight Suns… [+2224 chars]
